text:
My greatest source of inspiration for the choice of my studies and at the same time, my professionnal vocation, is <strong>Alex Dupont>. He's an extraordinary journalist and french radio host. He's also the Head of the Hip-Hop section for Apple Music France. As a passionate of journalism and music, I discovered him when he interviewed one of my favorite artists. I was fascinated by his way of expressing himself and his oral fluency that makes his interviews turn into a real exchange with the artist. Even at the radio, he offers real chronicles and he knows very well his subject. I was in law studies and I didn't find myself in it. I reoriented myself in information and communication because I want to be a journalist in the domain of culture with the aim of ensuring the legacy of Alex Dupont by keeping the notion of "exchange" which, I hope, will replace the term "interview". Moreover, I think I can bring a certain understanding of the artist, being a musician myself.
In addition of choosing studies in information and communication, I just took part in the radio of the university where I'll be writing articles about the cultural news and especially musical news. Therefore, I hope to be able to propose my own chronicle or exchange with the artists that I listen to on a daily day basis.
